Name: good game
About the game: good game some positive-good-karma-energy flowed out of control fromout some source - made flowers, plants, vegetables/fruits and insects grow bigger and come mad-happy-alive - some of them can hardly control this living-energy and stay restfull-happy - you also got affected - can blast energywaves - and cant stop smiling and knowing how funny it all is - and feel drawn-forced-compelled to find out the source of this. good game is a cartoony-2D-action-platformer like mario and cuphead - yet lesser (few-healthpoints)fragile-porcelain-cup-gameplay - more can take some falls/hits like a mug and jumping on enemies/projectiles and getting extra-lifes(health), timing-predicting-estamating physics-trajectories and sometimes even a bit of lucky timing with the randomizers - depending on the difficulty, one recieves some shots that one has to be wise with. new fun cartoony-enemies and bosses every level - mostly based on flowers, vegetables/fruits and insects that everyone knows. unique over the top never seen before - totally mad amounts of enemies and projectiles - 2D-platform-action that makes one - wonder if its not the right time to blast energywaves and stop saving shots for when it might even gets more mad!! funny (old-)cartoon sound effects and fun (old-)piano music multiple-difficulty modes - with each difficulty-mode great changes in the level - randomizers - with the enemies and the boss especially - besides the amount of health/shots at start and able to gain in the level - so its playable for both kids and for more experienced gamers and has greater-more-challenging replay value. + easy difficulty modes with many lives and shots + the difficulty mode - totally mad - in which one get one life and one shot more then the typical 3 with hard-mode and more hidden life's to gain in the levels.
